QtoSetDef.Name: Pset_MarineVehicleCommon
QtoSetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of _IfcTransportElement_ and types of _IfcTransportElementType_ with the predefined type set to VEHICLEMARINE.

QtoDef.Name: AboveDeckProjectedWindEnd
QtoDef.Definition: End on projected windage area above the main deck

QtoDef.Name: AboveDeckProjectedWindSide
QtoDef.Definition: Side on projected windage area above the main deck

QtoDef.Name: Displacement
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of water displaced by the vessel

QtoDef.Name: LaneMeters
QtoDef.Definition: Length of lanes accommodating vehicles on roll-on, roll-off vessels

QtoDef.Name: LengthBetweenPerpendiculars
QtoDef.Definition: Length of vessel from rudder shaft to crossing point of the bow and the loaded waterline.

QtoDef.Name: VesselDepth
QtoDef.Definition: Depth of the vessel from the main deck to the keel.

QtoDef.Name: VesselDraft
QtoDef.Definition: Depth of vessel from the waterline to the keel (LightShip, Ballasted, Maximum)
